sqlMap.select:
select
from SF_APPEND_MATERIAL_NOTICE where 1=1
ENTRUST_ID=#dattr1#
SF_APPEND_MATERIAL_NOTICE.ND = #nd#
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_TODO where executor=#executor# and instance_id = SF_APPEND_MATERIAL_NOTICE.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_UNTREAD where executor=#executor# and instance_id = SF_APPEND_MATERIAL_NOTICE.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where executor =#executor# and instance_id = SF_APPEND_MATERIAL_NOTICE.process_inst_id) and SF_APPEND_MATERIAL_NOTICE.STATUS!= 'cancel' and SF_APPEND_MATERIAL_NOTICE.STATUS != 'exec'
( exists (select WF_DRAFT_NAME from as_wf_draft where user_id=#executor# and compo_id=#wfcompoId# and WF_DRAFT_ID=SF_APPEND_MATERIAL_NOTICE.process_inst_id) or SF_APPEND_MATERIAL_NOTICE.process_inst_id = -1 ) and SF_APPEND_MATERIAL_NOTICE.STATUS ='0'
(SF_APPEND_MATERIAL_NOTICE.STATUS='exec')
1=1
order by APPEND_MATERIAL_NOTCE_ID desc
